title: The Engine Mistake? | Bluebaum vs Anand | Grenke Chess Classic 2018.
description:
#agadmator Check out the interview with Bluebaum https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uKLPpgbSCpA

Check out round 6 impressions https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aOvzUDNTTqQ&feature=youtu.be

Matthias Bluebaum vs Viswanathan Anand
GRENKE Chess Classic (2018), Karlsruhe/Baden Baden GER, rd 6, Apr-06 
Queen's Gambit Accepted: Rosenthal Variation (D21)

1. d4 d5 2. c4 e6 3. Nf3 dc4 4. e3 b5 5. a4 b4 6. Bc4 Nf6 7. a5 a6 8. Nbd2 Bb7 9. O-O c5 10. Nb3 Nbd7 11. dc5 Nc5 12. Nc5 Bc5 13. Qa4 Qd7 14. Qd7 Nd7 15. Bd2 Ke7 16. Rac1 Rhc8 17. Nd4 Ne5 18. Be2 Bd6 19. Rfd1 Bd5 20. Rc8 Rc8 21. Ba6 Ra8 22. Bf1 Ra5 23. Nb5 Bc5 24. Rc1 Ra2 25. Rc5 Rb2 26. e4 Rd2 27. ed5 ed5 28. Rc1 b3 29. Rb1 b2 30. Nc3 Nc4 31. Nd5 Rd5 32. Bc4 Rc5 33. Re1 Kf6 34. Bd3 Rd5 35. Bb1 h5 36. g3 g5 37. Kg2 g4 38. Re2 Rb5 39. Re8 Rd5 40. Re2 Rb5 41. h4 Kg7 42. Re7 Rd5 43. Rb7 Rd2 44. Ba2 Kh6 45. Bf7

The 2018 GRENKE Chess Classic is a 10-player round-robin held in Germany from 31 March to 9 April. The first 3 rounds are in Karlsruhe alongside the GRENKE Chess Open, then after a rest day the last 6 rounds are in the Kulturhaus LA8 in Baden-Baden. The field features World Champion Magnus Carlsen and fellow Top 10 players Fabiano Caruana, Maxime Vachier-Lagrave, Vishy Anand and Levon Aronian, as well as women's no. 1 Hou Yifan.

The time control is 100 minutes for 40 moves, then 50 minutes for 20 moves and then 15 minutes to the end of the game, with a 30-second increment from move 1. If players are tied for first place a rapid play-off will take place. Official website: www.grenkechessclassic.com
